snippet: The Dutch winger Arjen Robben has world-class skill and a penchant for theatrics, and along with Argentina’s Lionel Messi, he has been one of the most impactful players in the 2014 World Cup.
abstract: Dutch winger Arjen Robben, who is infuriating to many due to his reputation for diving and other theatrical antics on soccer field, may, along with Argentina's Lionel Messi, also be most impactful player left in World Cup.
lead_paragraph: The Dutch winger Arjen Robben has world-class skill and a penchant for theatrics, and along with Argentina’s Lionel Messi, he has been one of the most impactful players in the 2014 World Cup.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Arjen Robben of the Netherlands Proves to Be a Relentless Attacker and a Skilled Actor
headline.main: Invaluable and Infuriating All in One
headline.print_headline: Invaluable and Infuriating All in One
